title: (x) rounded bitmap �technology� - Punch {Stephen}
content: I can't find it, even with Test Pilot Collective's collection now searchable on MyFonts. Best I can suggest, if you want something free, choose from [one of these](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221655/http:/www.dafont.com/en/theme.php?cat=202&page=1&nb_ppp_old=10&texte=technology&nb_ppp=40&Envoyer=%A0OK%A0). But for something of (mostly) better quality, try [one of these](http://web.archive.org/web/20050526221655/http:/www.myfonts.com/browse/keyword/bitmap/?itemsperpage=100&resultcount=180&page=1).
author: cheshiredave

comments.content: And Stewf nonchalantly swoops in and lays the competition flat!
